lines.text: That's a huge weapon. What do you use it for?
Oh, I use it to keep my belt from flying over my shoulders. Some of the boys use 'em to pick their teeth.
[Ken has promised to take Mary for a morning ride to ask her a special question]
This is the first time I've ever seen a woman to be dressed and ready for an engagement.
Mountain lions or landslides, it's all the same to Ken Morley. He's a man after my own heart.
And after you're daughter's, too, I'm thinkin'.
